section.title: Element: Ambiguous
section.simpara: There are some cases where a given expression may be ambiguous with the information that we have now. In order to move forward, we allow for a given parsing to have ambiguous expression parses when the correct information cannot be determined.

formalpara.title: Ambiguous contents
formalpara.para: The contents of a Ambiguous element is one or more FuncExpr or Expression elements.

formalpara.title: Ambiguous attributes
formalpara.para: There are no attributes for the Ambiguous element.
